meanings.definition: To write a book or article together with someone else.
meanings.sent1: We are coauthoring a story for our school project.
meanings.sent2: The authors are coauthoring a new novel that will be published next year.
meanings.sent3: The two friends decided to try coauthoring a mystery book for fun.
meanings.sent4: Coauthoring with a skilled writer can greatly improve your own writing abilities.
meanings.sent5: She learned a lot about writing by coauthoring with her mentor.

meanings.definition: The act of collaborating with another person to create written work.
meanings.sent1: Their coauthoring resulted in a best-selling book.
meanings.sent2: Coauthoring can lead to new and exciting literary creations.
meanings.sent3: The coauthoring process was both challenging and rewarding.
meanings.sent4: The success of their coauthoring project brought them great satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The workshop focused on the benefits of coauthoring in academic writing.
